for some reason, I can't reach that web page anyway RJ.
 
 
In a message da=
ted 7/10/2010 5:56:08 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@... writ=
es:

 
 
 
Considering the attacks people continue to make against  me on h=
ere just 
for having a different opinion of people's results, I  think you =
will 
understand why I will not post my name and address  here.

Try anyway=
 though.  I don't know how your personal  beliefs here work, but 
others se=
em to get messages about people they've  never heard of, or places 
they've=
 never seen.

I would also  suggest anyone who tries this experiment, to po=
st your 
results on the  list here rather than sending them personally to m=
e - so I won't 
be  accused of losing any.



--- On Sat, 7/10/10,  Snowfir=
eL@...,<SnowfireL@...>  wrote:


From:  SnowfireL@...<Snowfire=
L@...>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC] Experiment 20100710
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oupsTo: 
Date: Saturday, July 10, 2010, 2:49  PM


 
What is your name RJ? =
and where do you live?  There are  probably tons of 
RJ's in this world, an=
d if i am going to ask any of  my guides if they want 
to play this game wi=
th you, I will not ask them  to run around the world a 
lookin for you. sf
=
 
 
In a message dated 7/10/2010 3:32:51 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rast=
erer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have placed a little something on top of my c=
omputer  monitor, right in 
front of me. It is now 7/10/2010. I will leave =
it  there 4 days, and remove 
it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010=
.

All you have to do is ask your boxes/spirits/  aliens/etc, what it is.

=
I have taken a picture of it, and  posted it to the files section here, so =

there is no way I can squirm  out of the results:

_http://tech. groups.ya=
hoo. com/group/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710. 
1.zip_ (http://tech.groups=
.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 

Please do not try to=
  open the file before noon Wednesday. But feel free to 
download it to  yo=
ur computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't change 
it  during, or a=
fter, the test.

Answers anyone reveals after noon  Wednesday don't count. =
Partial answers 
(like just the color, or  shape, or some emotion vibe) don=
't count. Just tell 
me what it  is.

Best of Luck. I hope for this to be a=
 regularly occurring  experiment, and 
I hope we all can learn from the res=
ults.  












--part1_e9518.765987f4.396a4791_boundary
